CustomField.description: This is an auxiliar field to create a string about the available credit limit
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Available_Credit_Limit__c ), "N/A", TEXT(ROUND( Available_Credit_Limit__c , 2)) & CASE( CurrencyCode__c , "USD", "$", "EUR", "â‚¬", "" ) )
CustomField.label: Available Credit Limit Aux
